original_text: In the thirty and eighth year of Azariah king of Judah did Zachariah the son of Jeroboam reign over Israel in Samaria six months.
korean_text: 유다의 왕 아사랴의 제삼십팔년에 여로보암의 아들 스가랴가 사마리아에서 여섯 달 동안 이스라엘을 다스리며

sentences.original_text: In the thirty and eighth year of Azariah king of Judah
did Zachariah the son of Jeroboam reign over Israel
